description: Break down 4 large billing and form components into smaller, focused components of ~90 LOC each

workstreams.description: Analyze existing components and identify extraction opportunities
Break down CreateTrustAccountForm.tsx (790 LOC) into sub-components
Break down EnterpriseForm.tsx (744 LOC) into sub-components
Break down FinancialReports.tsx (714 LOC) into sub-components
Break down InvoiceBuilder.tsx (703 LOC) into sub-components

decisions.decision: Extract step-specific components for CreateTrustAccountForm multi-step wizard
decisions.rationale: Each step (Account Info, Bank Details, Compliance, Signatories, Review) can be isolated component

decisions.decision: Extract field rendering and validation logic into reusable components for EnterpriseForm
decisions.rationale: Field rendering logic is complex and can be shared across form sections

decisions.decision: Extract tab-specific report components for FinancialReports
decisions.rationale: Each report tab (profitability, realization, WIP, forecasting, performance) is independent

decisions.decision: Extract invoice sections (details, line items, summary, fee arrangement) for InvoiceBuilder
decisions.rationale: Each section has distinct responsibility and can be managed separately
